main_image.description: The component dynamically evaluates password strength on a scale from 0 to 1, based on customizable rules such as length, uppercase letters, special characters, and numbers. It allows you to modify strength and warning bar colors, and provides user-friendly recommendations for creating strong passwords. Additionally, it features an optional confirm-password field to ensure consistency and includes a visual indicator that adapts to the password's strength. With a mobile-friendly design and adjustable styles, this component offers a seamless, flexible solution for password validation.

description: I developed a customizable React Native component designed to evaluate and display password strength. This component offers dynamic status indicators, providing users with real-time feedback on their password strength. It also includes password recommendations to help users create stronger passwords. Additionally, the component supports password confirmation functionality with visual feedback, ensuring a seamless and user-friendly experience. This tool has been launched on npm, making it easy for developers to integrate into their projects with a simple 'npm install'.
description_short: A customizable React Native component for password strength evaluation with dynamic indicators, recommendations, and visual feedback for confirmation. This tool has been launched on npm.
